message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1000000 to you. Considering its immense worth and the unique opportunity it presents, I am offering it to you for $950000. This is a special offer tailored to ensure you have the chance to acquire this valuable asset at a price that still yields a significant profit for me. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
